text: The hospital muffled my cry for help I felt like I had nowhere else to go   My boyfriend of   years and I were planning to move in together and talking about marriage  when he suddenly dumped me for my friend and got his own place   I lost my job due to my mental issues causing an inability to work  Despite struggling with mental health for as long as I can remember  I have not gotten a diagnosis because I cannot afford medical help  Due to not being able to get a diagnosis  I can t apply for disability  So I have no job or income  no place to live  no supportive family  and I m just getting more and more debt   Immediately after losing my last job  I walked to the emergency room at the local hospital  I briefed them on my situation  including telling them about how I am suicidal and hear voices that are seriously getting out of control  to the point where they re beginning to be able to control my body and I am losing all feelings of control over my life  I also told them explicitly that I did NOT want to leave due to what was going on At the hospital  they left me alone in a room for what felt like a long time until a nurse came in  and gave me a pill to  calm me down  Ended up being an Ativan which I ve never had before  The Ativan made me feel all loopy and between that and the nurse somehow I got talked into leaving  but not before they gave me a prescription for NINETY pills  which they said were a starter antidepressant which of course just went onto the credit card bill It seems like the world has given me every sign to just give up  I ve been avoiding the hospital and saving it as a final cry for help  but even the people who are paid to save lives don t give a shit about me   tl dr I went to the hospital ER saying I was suicidal  they left me alone then gave me   pills and influenced me to leave after I told them I don t want to  Feel like I m out of options
summary: After losing her job, she went to the hospital ER because she was suicidal. She was left alone in a room for a long time and was given Ativan to calm her down. text: Caffeine withdrawal So I m pretty sure the reason I ve had bad headaches and I ve been so sleep today and yesterday is bc I haven t had coffee  Honestly I got these coffee beans a week ago and I heard they go bad a week after you open the bag so I was trying to get it finished so I don t waste any beans  Now I m paying the price  I don t wanna give up caffeine entirely but I hate how it feels to suddenly stop  No wonder people get so addicted to it  I used to think people exaggerate how tired they feel without it but once you stop it makes you more tired than you were before you started  The only way to get rid of the headaches and sleepiness instantly is to go back to having caffeine  It s basically and endless cycle  I really wanna have more rn but I m not sure what to do so this doesn t happen again  Also I m probably gonna need a smaller bag of coffee beans because that s way too much for one person
summary: Caffeine withdrawal is the reason I've had bad headaches and I haven't had coffee for a week. I don't want to give up caffeine but I hate how it feels to suddenly stop. The only way to get rid of the headaches and sleepiness is to go back to having caffeine.
